pr_title: Exposes an argument in the mitochondria WDL

timeline.bodyText:
Is there a reason why you don't initialize this in the input section instead of making this optional? e.g.,
input {
   ...
   Int max_reads_per_alignment_start = 75
   ...
}

This lets a caller override it but since it's not optional you don't need to select_first() on it.
timeline.author: pshapiro4broad

replies.bodyText: When I tried that it didn't show up as an input in Terra. That would definitely be preferable.
replies.author: meganshand

replies.bodyText: Well I have no experience with Terra inputs, so maybe there's no better way to do it then. I know it's not visible until allowNestedInputs: true is set.. but once you do that, you should be able to pass through any workflow inputs.

replies.bodyText: megan i think i got this to work. see https://portal.firecloud.org/?return=terra#methods/andrea_methods/MitochondriaPipeline_experiment/4 (which uses an AlignAndCallTest workflow that defaults this arg to 75).
